mapper.select:
select count(distinct a.app_id) from OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL a left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C2 b on a.app_id = b.app_id left join OPAS_FILE_PATCHBOLT c on a.app_id = c.app_id left join OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK d on a.app_id = d.app_id left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 e on a.app_id = e.app_id where (a.flag = '2' or a.flag='0') and a.APP_RESULT = '1'
and a.app_id like '${appId}%'
and e.c1_cname like '${custName}%'
and a.cred_No like '${credNo}%'
and b.c2_cname like '${c2Cname}%'
and b.c2_idnbr like '${c2Idnbr}%'
and c.patch_Code like '${patchCode}%'

select distinct a.app_id, e.c1_cname cust_name, a.cred_no cred_no, b.c2_cname C2_CNAME, a.STATUS, b.C2_IDNBR, c.PATCH_CODE, d.APP_ID REMARK_ID, a.YDJ_FLAG from OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL a left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C2 b on a.app_id = b.app_id left join OPAS_FILE_PATCHBOLT c on a.app_id = c.app_id left join (SELECT DISTINCT APP_ID FROM OPAS_ALLOT_APPLY_REMARK) d on a.app_id = d.app_id left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 e on a.app_id = e.app_id where (a.flag = '2' or a.flag='0') and a.APP_RESULT = '1'
and a.app_id like '${appId}%'
and e.c1_cname like '${custName}%'
and a.cred_No like '${credNo}%'
and b.c2_cname like '${c2Cname}%'
and b.c2_idnbr like '${c2Idnbr}%'
and c.patch_Code like '${patchCode}%'
order by a.app_id asc

select distinct d.app_id APP_ID, a.c1_cname cust_name, d.cred_no cred_no, a.c1_idtype C1_IDTYPE, d.status STATUS, d.operator OPERATOR, d.operat_time OPERAT_TIME from OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL d left join OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 a on a.app_id = d.app_id where d.app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=CHAR}
select INPUT_CHANNEL, C1_CNAME, C1_IDTYPE, C1_IDNBR,MATCHING_CARD_FLAG,YDJ_FLAG,C1C2_FLAG,APP_ID,C1_MOBILE,QUICK_CARD_FLAG from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 where app_id like concat(#{_parameter},'%')

select t2.APP_ID, t2.approver , t2.PRE_APPROVELIMIT, t2.POLICY_CODE1, t2.POLICY_CODE2, t2.POLICY_CODE3, t2.VIOLATE_CODE1, t2.VIOLATE_CODE2, t2.VIOLATE_CODE3, t2.MEMO, t2.refuse_code1, t2.refuse_code2, t2.refuse_code3, t2.APPROVE_RESULT from OPAS_BIZ_APPROVAL_His t2 where t2.app_id = #{appId, jdbcType=CHAR} order by t2.approve_time desc
mapper.delete: delete from OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL where app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=CHAR} and (flag = '2' or flag = '0')
mapper.select: select app_id APP_ID, APRROVE_WAY, ydj_flag YDJ_FLAG from OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL where app_id = '${_parameter}' and APP_RESULT = '1' and (flag = '0' or flag = '2')

select A.APP_ID,A.C1_CNAME,A.C1_IDNBR,A.C1_HMTEL,A.C1_CONAME,A.C1_MOBILE,A.C1_BIRTH,A.YDJ_FLAG, A.C1_HMADD1||A.C1_HMADD2||A.C1_HMADD3||A.C1_HMADD4 as C1_HMADD_TOTAL,A.C5_IDTE1,A.C1_REMOBIL, B.APPROVE_RESULT,B.APPROVE_CREDIT_LIMIT,C.STATUS, approvecode(b.approve_result,b.policy_code1,b.refuse_code1) as CREDIT_REFUSE_REASON,B.APPROVER_NAME,a.C1_RENAME, a.C1_RETELAR||a.C1_RETEL as C1_RETEL from OPAS_BIZ_INP_APPL_C1 a left join OPAS_BIZ_APPROVAL b on a.app_id = b.app_id left join OPAS_FILE_APPLICATION_DETAIL c on a.app_id=c.app_id where a.app_id = #{appId}

mapper.select:
